data.text:
Today, we look at the life of Fiona Loudon, a Scottish actress, who attained fame after her marriage to Daniel Craig, the famous “James Bond” actor.

However, the marriage lasted for a few years and brought forth a daughter, Ella Craig, who’s also an actress.

Despite being an actress herself, Fiona Loudon didn’t achieve much fame like her ex-husband and daughter. Also, she managed to keep her private life away from the public’s eyes.

Therefore, this article reveals all you need to know about Fiona Loudon. I’ll be discussing her biography, career, net worth, family, and social media.

Fiona Loudon’s Biography

Fiona Loudon, born on May 5, 1968, is a Scottish actress. She was born in Scotland and had her elementary education there.

However, she moved to England in her early twenties and studied drama at the University of London.

Fiona started her acting career in the early 90s, particularly on stage. However, she withdrew after her marriage to Daniel Craig.

News of their relationship leaked to the public in 1991, and in 1992 they were married. Moreover, her marriage to Daniel brought her to the limelight.

However, the marriage ended two years later after having a daughter together.

While her ex-husband went on to remarry and also achieved more fame in his acting career, Fiona remained single and raised her daughter in London.

She kept away from the spotlight, revealing little about her life to the public. The former actress now works as a psychotherapist and art therapist.

Fiona Loudon’s Career

Fiona Loudon is a former actress who debuted in 1991. She focused primarily on stage drama and achieved fame performing several roles on stage in Scotland and London theater.

Also, she appeared on a few TV shows, which didn’t gain much attention.

However, after her marriage to Daniel Craig, she stopped making appearances on stage and screen, focusing on family life.

Even after their divorce, she kept her private life away from the public. She never returned to acting.

Rather, Fiona focused on raising her daughter in London until she was of age. She returned to work afterward, not as an actress but as a psychotherapist and art therapist.

Additionally, she returned to school and got a master’s degree in Music Therapy from Nordoff Robbins (2003–2005). In her spare time, she paints and plays music.

Furthermore, she changed her name to Harley Loudon, without disclosing why.

Fiona Loudon’s Movies

During her active acting years, Fiona performed more in stage plays. She didn’t feature in any movie.

How Much Is Fiona Loudon’s Net Worth?

According to several sources, Fiona Loudon has a net worth of $10 million.

Fiona Loudon’s Family

Fiona did not reveal to the public any information about her parents. Also, it’s not known if she has any siblings.

However, while she was only 23 years old, she got married to Daniel Craig and had a daughter with him before their divorce in 1994, two years later.

Daniel Craig is one of the many renowned English actors, famous for his role as James Bond 007 in the popular British movie series, “James Bond,” an adaptation of Ian Flemming’s, spy novel.

His successful career is attributed to his many roles in the acting industry, starring in movies like The Trench, Love is the Devil, Elizabeth, and several others.

However, it was his portrayal of the James Bond character that shot him to fame. He started with Casino Royale in 2006 and went on to act in four other James Bond movies up until 2021.

Additionally, the veteran actor has several nominations and awards to his name.

The “James Bond” role, Skyfall (2012) won him the “Best Actor in an Action Movie” for the Critics’ Choice Movie Award. Also, he received a nomination within the same category of the award for Spectre (2015).

He also got a nomination for “Best Actor in a Leading Role” for the BAFTA Award, in his first James Bond movie.

On the other hand, Ella Craig, well-known as Ella Loudon, daughter of Fiona Loudon and Daniel Craig, is also into acting like her parents.

She started her career in theater productions briefly, performing in the play, Shakespeare and Company.

From then, she went fully into acting in 2007, starring in various movies, including, Memory’s Paradigm, Maneater, Trauma is a Time Machine, Can’t Let It Go, Texas Road, and others.

The young woman shares a deep bond with her mother. She also has a good relationship with her father, and his wife, Rachel Weisz.

Fiona Loudon and Daniel Craig

Fiona Loudon and Daniel Craig started a relationship in 1991 and got married in 1992.

Daniel, who was a fast-rising actor, had the media’s attention on him, but they couldn’t get the story of how he and Fiona met.

After their wedding, they welcomed their daughter a few months later, and all seemed to be going well for them until their marriage crashed in 1994.

Both parties kept the details of the divorce a secret and moved on with their life. It wasn’t until after a few years that Daniel spoke briefly in an interview about their relationship.

He revealed that both of them were quite young when they got married, which affected their relationship. He went on to state that he was immature at the time of the divorce.

Furthermore, after the divorce, Daniel Craig went on to pursue a 7-year relationship with German actress Heike Makatsch, which ended in 2004.

Also, he had another relationship with film producer, Satsuki Mitchell, which ended in 2010. He eventually got married in 2011 to Rachel Weisz, who starred alongside him in the film, Dream House (2011).

How Old Is Fiona Loudon?

Fiona Loudon, born on the 5th of May 1968, is 55 years old.

What Is Fiona Loudon’s Instagram?

Wrapping Up

After her divorce and her time in the London Theater, Fiona found a new path for herself as a psychotherapist and art therapist.

She picked a new interest in music and went on to get a Master’s degree in Music Therapy.

Fiona Loudon now lives her quiet life singing and painting, and helping others with art therapy. She shares a close bond with her daughter, Ella Loudon.
